articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: U.S. Nursing Home Deaths Drop Sharply
articles.description: The pandemic death toll in such facilities has plummeted from a peak of 5,000 a week to less than 300. And a global vaccination effort for low-income nations got a $2.4 billion boost.
articles.content:

articles.author: Graham Bowley
articles.title: Here are some key dates in the Cosby case.
articles.description: A Pennsylvania appeals court ruled that the actor and comedian was denied a fair trial in 2018, when he was convicted of assaulting Andrea Constand, a former Temple University employee.
articles.content: Bill Cosby had his conviction for sexual assault overturned by a Pennsylvania appeals court on Wednesday, a decision that set free a man whose case had represented the first high-profile sexual assau… [+5625 chars]
